attributes.action: call for a redesign of the 2012 London Olympics logo...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo for the 2012 Olympics and Paralympics unveiled on the fourth of June 2007 is embarrassingly badly designed. If not reworked it will become a source of national humiliation for Britain in front of the entire world. Let us call for a new , better effort at representing our national pride and great sporting tradition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
